attributes.action: The UK to host a Major WWE PPV
attributes.additional_details: The UK is one of the biggest supporters of WWE but are continued to be over looked for PPV events. It's been over 25 years since the last major WWE event and we now think it's time to bring it back.
attributes.background:
It's time for the UK to have a WWE PPV!

WWE last held a major PPV in the UK in 1992 which is still the record attendance for SummerSlam.
